subject: Baseball
Blacks
Names, Geographical
lead_paragraph: A few days after Monday’s anniversary of Jackie Robinson’s debut with the Brooklyn Dodgers, Cooperstown, N.Y., will dedicate a street to Bud Fowler, a much earlier player who helped integrate the game.
snippet: A few days after Monday’s anniversary of Jackie Robinson’s debut with the Brooklyn Dodgers, Cooperstown, N.Y., will dedicate a street to Bud Fowler, a much earlier player who helped integrate the game.
